event.description: Carlos Santana grounds out, third baseman Joey Gallo to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Francisco Lindor called out on strikes.
Brandon Guyer flies out to left fielder Nomar Mazara.
Edwin Encarnacion strikes out swinging.
Jose Ramirez lines out to second baseman Rougned Odor.
Yandy Diaz strikes out swinging, catcher Jonathan Lucroy to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Austin Jackson pops out to catcher Jonathan Lucroy in foul territory.
Roberto Perez grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Abraham Almonte strikes out swinging.
Carlos Santana singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Nomar Mazara.
Francisco Lindor singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Nomar Mazara. Carlos Santana to 2nd.
Brandon Guyer pops out to second baseman Rougned Odor on the infield fly rule.
Edwin Encarnacion grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Mike Napoli. Carlos Santana to 3rd. Francisco Lindor to 2nd.

Jose Ramirez singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo. Carlos Santana scores. Francisco Lindor scores. Jose Ramirez out at 2nd on the throw, right fielder Shin-Soo Choo to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Yandy Diaz singles on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
With Austin Jackson batting, throwing error by Cole Hamels on the pickoff attempt, Yandy Diaz to 2nd.
Austin Jackson grounds out, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli. Yandy Diaz to 3rd.
Roberto Perez out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Nomar Mazara. Yandy Diaz scores.
Abraham Almonte grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Carlos Santana flies out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Francisco Lindor homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Brandon Guyer hit by pitch.
With Edwin Encarnacion batting, wild pitch by Cole Hamels, Brandon Guyer to 2nd.
Edwin Encarnacion walks.
Jose Ramirez lines out to left fielder Nomar Mazara.
Yandy Diaz lines out to right fielder Shin-Soo Choo.
Pitching Change: Tony Barnette replaces Cole Hamels.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Tyler Naquin replaces Austin Jackson.
Tyler Naquin grounds out, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Roberto Perez singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Michael Martinez replaces Roberto Perez.
With Abraham Almonte batting, wild pitch by Tony Barnette, Michael Martinez to 2nd.
Abraham Almonte grounds out sharply, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli. Michael Martinez to 3rd.
Carlos Santana strikes out swinging.
Drew Robinson remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Ryan Rua remains in the game as the left fielder.
Defensive switch from left field to right field for Nomar Mazara.
Pitching Change: Matt Bush replaces Tony Barnette.
Francisco Lindor walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Michael Brantley replaces Brandon Guyer.
Michael Brantley strikes out swinging.
Edwin Encarnacion flies out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
With Jose Ramirez batting, Francisco Lindor steals (1) 2nd base.
Jose Ramirez strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Sam Dyson replaces Matt Bush.
Yandy Diaz singles on a ground ball to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Tyler Naquin singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Rua. Yandy Diaz to 2nd.
Yan Gomes lines out to right fielder Nomar Mazara.
Abraham Almonte walks. Yandy Diaz to 3rd. Tyler Naquin to 2nd.
Carlos Santana walks. Yandy Diaz scores. Tyler Naquin to 3rd. Abraham Almonte to 2nd.
Francisco Lindor hits a grand slam (2) to right field. Tyler Naquin scores. Abraham Almonte scores. Carlos Santana scores.
Pitching Change: Jeremy Jeffress replaces Sam Dyson.
Michael Brantley grounds out softly, pitcher Jeremy Jeffress to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Edwin Encarnacion grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Delino DeShields strikes out on a foul tip.
Shin-Soo Choo walks.
Nomar Mazara homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field. Shin-Soo Choo scores.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging.
Rougned Odor called out on strikes.
Carlos Gomez walks.
Jonathan Lucroy grounds into a double play, shortstop Francisco Lindor to second baseman Jose Ramirez to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion. Carlos Gomez out at 2nd.
Joey Gallo strikes out swinging.
Elvis Andrus singles on a line drive to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Delino DeShields out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman Yandy Diaz to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion. Elvis Andrus to 2nd.
Shin-Soo Choo grounds out, shortstop Francisco Lindor to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion. Elvis Andrus to 3rd.
Nomar Mazara lines out to center fielder Austin Jackson.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging.
Rougned Odor singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Abraham Almonte.
With Carlos Gomez batting, Rougned Odor caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Roberto Perez to second baseman Jose Ramirez.
Carlos Gomez strikes out swinging.
Jonathan Lucroy singles on a ground ball to second baseman Jose Ramirez.
Joey Gallo walks. Jonathan Lucroy to 2nd.
Elvis Andrus strikes out swinging.
Delino DeShields pops out to catcher Roberto Perez in foul territory.
Shin-Soo Choo reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by shortstop Francisco Lindor. Jonathan Lucroy scores. Joey Gallo scores. Shin-Soo Choo to 2nd. Throwing error by shortstop Francisco Lindor.

Nomar Mazara singles on a line drive to center fielder Austin Jackson. Shin-Soo Choo scores. Nomar Mazara out at 2nd on the throw, center fielder Austin Jackson to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion to shortstop Francisco Lindor.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging.
Rougned Odor strikes out swinging.
Carlos Gomez walks.
Pitching Change: Dan Otero replaces Danny Salazar.
Jonathan Lucroy grounds into a force out, shortstop Francisco Lindor to second baseman Jose Ramirez. Carlos Gomez out at 2nd.
Tyler Naquin remains in the game as the center fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Yan Gomes replaces Michael Martinez, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Joey Gallo strikes out swinging.
Elvis Andrus homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Drew Robinson replaces Delino DeShields.
Drew Robinson grounds out softly to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Shin-Soo Choo walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Ryan Rua replaces Shin-Soo Choo.
Nomar Mazara singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Brandon Guyer. Ryan Rua to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Zach McAllister replaces Dan Otero.
Mike Napoli grounds out, second baseman Jose Ramirez to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Michael Brantley remains in the game as the left fielder.
Rougned Odor pops out to catcher Yan Gomes in foul territory.
Carlos Gomez grounds out, second baseman Jose Ramirez to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Pitching Change: Shawn Armstrong replaces Zach McAllister.
Jonathan Lucroy strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Bryan Shaw replaces Shawn Armstrong.
Joey Gallo strikes out on a foul tip.
Elvis Andrus pops out to second baseman Jose Ramirez.
Drew Robinson grounds out, shortstop Francisco Lindor to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
